name: AI-Shorts-Creator (NisaarAgharia)
description: [项目级] AI-Video-Cropper is a Python-based tool that leverages the power of GPT-4 (OpenAI's language model) to automatically analyze videos, extract the most interesting sections, and crop them for improved viewing experience. This project combines the capabilities of GPT-4, FFmpeg, and OpenCV to automate the process of identifying highlights in videos。来源: https://github.com/NisaarAgharia/AI-Shorts-Creator

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
AI-Video-Cropper is a Python-based tool that leverages the power of GPT-4 (OpenAI's language model) to automatically analyze videos, extract the most interesting sections, and crop them for improved viewing experience. This project combines the capabilities of GPT-4, FFmpeg, and OpenCV to automate the process of identifying highlights in videos

来源: https://github.com/NisaarAgharia/AI-Shorts-Creator
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 744
